name: Ray Frye
text: Great people, great draft beer selections and th ed best pizza.

name: Vicki Littell
text: The best Gluten Free from a pizzeria!!! The crust is corporate, however it was still yummy. I ordered the House Special and it was loaded with pizza goodness. And yes.. my friends enjoyed their regular pizza too.

name: Tom Richmond
text: Excellent service as always. Our food was brought out hot and in a timely manner. We had a group of 11 very tired and hungry people who were treated like kings.  All thanks to our friends at Mellow Mushroom in Mobile, Alabama!

name: Cynthia Montecalvo
text: Gone before it’s time! Just heard the sad news that this location will be closing this upcoming weekend! I can’t believe it! I have so many wonderful memories here! I’ve done the Mellow Milers run too many times to count! Not to mention the Urban Assault & LODA group rides. I love this place! Heart broken!

name: Elodie Rodriguez
text: Great food here !! Lots of vegetarian / vegan options

name: Haley Elaine
text: I love this mellow! Awesome staff! Super fun people and nice! I also love the food! They are my favorite pizza place! :)

name: Xander Meadors
text: Amazing staff and food. Clean. Perfect service. No long wait for seating! Love love

name: Chasity Johnson
text: I truly enjoyed the food it was awesome my only negative review is because I did not leave a tip the waiter actually came out to the car and asked why... I understand where the waiter was coming from being in a rush but do not be so eager for a tip... other than that I love the mellow

name: Christen Gerlach
text: The Nappie Awards really nailed it! They really do have the best pizza in town!! Thanks for the wonderful experience, friends!! Great service and great food. I’ll always be back! 🤗

name: Marlania Cruz
text: I went into the restaurant during evening hours and honestly did not feel welcomed. The ladies who worked the evening shift did not greet me as I walked through the door. I noticed none of the workers smiled at the customers during the time …More

name: Steven Flaskerud
text: Food and service is excellent. Staff is very friendly. Keep up the great work.

name: Jody Mallinson
text: This place is fun! Great staff and atmosphere.  And the best thing is the food.  Best pizza and salad I have had in 20 years.  I am from the east coast and do not get a chance to eat like this in the mid west.  Glad I did the Groupon on this.  Alabama has some great food.

name: David Thacker
text: Good variety of fresh made pizza, full bar service if you want alcohol, some sandwiches and salads on the menu although they really aren't that great. Place is quite busy during peak hours, but service is usually very good and so is the …More

name: Michelle Campbell
text: Great pizza & great service!!! Very mellow & even smelled like mushrooms! They really got that one spot on!!! I loved the paintings... I felt young and alive again! All the cuties should go there:)

name: Carolyn Byrne
text: Great staff! Kid friendly unlike Courtlands pub in town and food is always delicious! Thank you mellow mushroom for you excellent customer service!

name: John Houseman
text: Pizza was GREAT! Beer could've been a bit colder, but our waitstaff more than made up for that minor detail. Can't wait till we have one in my town!

name: Harmony Thomas
text: A nice beer and a yummy yeasty pizza do the trick for a hangover at Mardi Gras. Outside seating and bar is convenient and great for our strange, and erratic weather. Meet up with friends bring your dog and enjoy a pint of handcrafted,  local brew sit back and people watch. Or eat inside and watch the game. I love the staff an

name: Nghia Huynh
text: Service: The staff was really kind. Everyone seemed to enjoy being there and really get to express themselves with their style. …More

name: Matt Irvin
text: Really good tonight. Service was a little slow, but it was kind of late when we got there. Not too bad, though.

name: Steve Lewis
text: If you have ever had Mellow Mushroom pizza any where else in the US and was thinking, that great pizza with great ingredients and better crust was going to be what you get.. Then don't go to the one on Airport Rd in Mobile, Alabama. …More

name: Austin Hopkins
text: Good fresh ingredients and the service was good but mellow mushroom needs to learn how to roll out a pie.  80% of the dough ends up on the crust.  I don't pay for crust.

name: Kelly Mason
text: While heading to Pensacola for vacation we decided to find a gluten free friendly restaurant that 2 of our daughters could eat something besides a salad. We have had the best experience and food from a restaurant in a long time. Wonderful staff.

name: Hannah Seale
text: Moderate prices but worth it. Not just pizza but a variety of sandwiches, hoagies, and appetizers. Also has a huge draft beer selection with calsics, imports, local, and craft beers. Offer pick up orders, has indoor and outdoor seating, …More

name: Mike Fletcher
text: The service and good is consistently excellent.

name: Stuckin D'South
text: The food was okay. It could have been seasoned better but the ingredients were good and they have an interesting selection of things. It's a fun decor and great staff though. Only slightly expensive but again, good ingredients.

name: Tracy Hudson
text: My favorite pizza and beer place. All around awesome. A little pricey but you won't regret it once you see and taste the food

name: Claudia McCalla
text:
Great Pizza! The thin crust pie rates up there with Wells Bros in Racine, WI!!!
And the menu has really interesting combinations to try.

name: Mike Martin
text: Great pizza, excellent beer choices, and even better service.  Definitely funky!

name: Brian Wright
text: Great food and great staff. They have a variety of weekly happenings: trivia on Monday's, Mellow Milers on Tuesday and bikers on Thursday I think. The patio is quite lovely on a mild afternoon with a beer and some pizza with friends.

name: Laryssa Noyes
text: I had the white pizza and it was so good. I didn't want to eat the whole thing to bring it home for lunch the best day, but it was so good that i finished it at the restaurant.

name: Carolyn Mai
text: Never disappointed. Food is always on point and super delicious.

name: Jerry Persons

name: Ericka Jenkins
text: We enjoyed our meal but we really enjoyed our waitress!  She really left a lasting impression.

text: The food iss great and so fresh! Ordered a salad and a pizza. The salad came out almost immediately and was decked out; crazy. Anyways, you have to try it!!!
